npcs.name: Bandit Leader
dialogue: Well, well... what do we have here? A wanderer on our hills?
These lands belong to me and my crew. You'd best be paying a toll if you want to pass.
Five gold, and you can go on your way. Or you can try your luck against our blades.
What'll it be, stranger? The easy way or the hard way?
*fingers the hilt of his sword* Tick tock, traveler. I'm not a patient man.

npcs.name: Old Shepherd
dialogue: *tending to his sheep* Ahh, a visitor! Don't get many of those up here.
Watch yourself in these hills. Bandits have been more active lately.
That old watchtower used to keep the peace, but it's been abandoned for years.
I've been herding sheep here for fifty years. Know every rock and hill for miles.
If you're heading further west, be careful. Strange lights in the sky at night, and people gone missing.

npcs.name: Wounded Hunter
dialogue: *clutches a bandaged arm* Stay back from the south hills, friend.
There's an orc camp down there. Nearly lost my life when I stumbled upon it.
They've got sentries posted all around. Must be a dozen of 'em at least.
I heard rumors of a merchant caravan that went missing last week. Bet those green-skins are behind it.
If you're fool enough to go near that place, you'd better be well armed. Their chieftain is a monster.

hardcoded_items.name: Light Spellbook
hardcoded_items.description: Creates a magical light that lasts for a short time.
